name: CatchApplesRM
description:
Game where you catch apples to get high score!

This game is remake from my 5 year old game called Nappaa omput (Catch Apples in english). I created that game in scratch and wanted now 5 years later to redo it and see how much I've improved as a game developer.

This game is very simple, but I hope you enjoy playing it.

Mobile and web version will come soon!

If you see any bugs or glitches in the game I would be thankful if you reported to me so I could improve the game even more.

To these pictures and feelings, from here to here!
